titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands and facilities in Whitfield County, Georgia, to the University of Georgia.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Referred to Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received From Interior.

committee.subcommittee: Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment
committee.name: House Merchant Marine and Fisheries

bill.summary: 8/5/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey the Cohutta Fish Hatchery in Whitefield County, Georgia, to the University of Georgia.
